description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity for an Android TV application, managing the layout and navigation of the TV home screen UI, including top bar, rows of movie cards, and info pane.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main activity class handling UI initialization, focus management, and navigation for Android TV home screen.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, and builds movie rows.

methods.name: buildRows
methods.description: Creates and adds movie row views and titles to the layout.

methods.name: dp
methods.description: Converts density-independent pixels to actual pixel values.

methods.name: onItemFocused
methods.description: Callback when an item in a row gains focus; updates info pane and scrolls to make row visible.

methods.name: onItemClicked
methods.description: Handles click events on movie items, currently no navigation logic implemented.

methods.name: requestFocusUp
methods.description: Handles upward focus navigation, moving focus to the top bar or the row above.

methods.name: requestFocusDown
methods.description: Handles downward focus navigation, moving focus to the next row or info pane buttons.

methods.name: ensureRowVisible
methods.description: Scrolls the view to ensure a specific row is visible.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles hardware key events, specifically back and down navigation.
